0:
Hello, this is Misty Movie
We focus on film interpretation and are committed to sharing all kinds of interesting films in the world with you.  We will explain the films in our own way to bring you a better understanding
- The channel is updated daily, mainly focusing on fantasy and comedy films
- Our team is made up of 2-3 people, and every day we discuss which movies are more appealing
- Copywriting and editing are handled by different people to ensure the originality of the content
- We will take interesting movie clips and explain them to give you a complete story
- Finally, we will carefully check the finished product to ensure the video quality

If I use content from your movie and you want to delete it, you can leave a message and we will deal with it in a timely manner.  We don't intend to violate anyone's rights

Thanks for subscribing!
